maqras.text: Rahamana, rahima [1] allah‌ra name
sakala ‘ham‌da’ [1] allah‌ra [2], yini srstikulera [3] raba
dayamaya, parama dayalu
bicara dinera malika
Amara sudhu apanara'i ‘ibadata [1] kari [2], ebam sudhu apanara'i sahayya prarthana kari
amaderake sarala pathera hidayata dina
tadera patha, yaderake apani ni‘amata diyechena [1], yadera upara apanara krodha apatita hayani [2] ebam yara pathabhrasta'o naya
Alipha- lama- mima
Eta [1] se kitaba yate kono sandeha ne'i [2], muttakidera jan'ya [3] hedayeta
yara gayebera [1] prati imana ane [2], salata kayema kare [3] ebam taderake amara ya dana karechi ta theke byaya kare
Ara yara imana ane tate ya apanara upara nayila kara hayeche ebam ya apanara purbe nayila kara hayeche [1], ara yara akherate niscita bisbasi
Tara'i tadera rabera nirdesita hidayatera upara rayeche ebam tara'i saphalakama
Yara kuphari [1] kareche apani taderake satarka karuna ba na karuna [2], tara imana anabe na
Allah‌ tadera hrdayasamuha o tadera srabanasaktira upara mohara kare diyechena [1], ebam tadera drstira upara rayeche abarana. Ara tadera jan'ya rayeche mahasasti
Ara [1] manusera madhye emana loka'o rayeche yara bale, ‘amara allah‌ o sesa dibase imana enechi’, athaca tara mumina naya
Allah‌ ebam muminaderake tara pratarita kare. Bastutah tara nijederake'i nijera pratarita karache, athaca tara ta bujhe na
Tadera antarasamuhe rayeche byadhi. Atahpara allah‌ tadera byadhi ara'o bariye diyechena [1]. Ara tadera jan'ya rayeche kastadayaka sasti, karana tara mithyabadi
Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, ‘tomara yamine phasada srsti karo na’[1], tara bale, ‘amara to kebala sansodhanakari’
Sabadhana! Era'i phasada srstikari, kintu tara ta bujhe na

Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, ‘tomara imana ana yemana lokera imana eneche’[1], tara bale, ‘nirbodha lokera yerupa imana eneche amara'o ki serupa imana anabo[2]?’ Sabadhana! Niscaya era nirbodha, kintu tara ta jane na

Ara yakhana tara muminadera sathe saksata kare, takhana bale, ‘amara imana enechi‘[1], ara yakhana tara ekante tadera sayatanadera [2] sathe ekatrita haya, takhana bale, ‘niscaya amara tomadera sathe achi. Amara to kebala upahasakari.’
Allah‌ tadera sathe upahasa karena [1], ebam taderake tadera abadhyatara madhye bibhrantera mata ghure berabara abakasa dena
Era'i tara, yara hedayatera binimaye bhrastata kineche [1]. Kaje'i tadera byabasa labhajanaka hayani. Ara tara hedayataprapta'o naya

Tadera upama [1], ai byaktira n'yaya, ye aguna jbalalo; tarapara yakhana aguna tara caradika alokita karala, allah‌ takhana tadera alo niye gelena ebam taderake ghora andakare phele dilena, yate tara kichu'i dekhate paya na
Tara badhira, boba, andha, kaje'i tara phire asabe na

Kimba akasa hate musaladhare brstira n'yaya, yate rayeche ghora andhakara, bajradhbani [1] o bidyutcamaka. Bajradhbanite mrtyubhaye tara tadera kane angula deya. Ara allah‌ kapheraderake paribestana kare rayechena

Bidyut camake tadera drstisakti kere neyara upakrama haya [1]. Yakhana'i bidyutaloka tadera samane udbhasita haya takhana'i tara patha cale ebam yakhana andhakare dheke yaya takhana tara tham‌ke damraya [2]. Allah‌ icche karale tadera srabana o drstisakti harana karate parena. Niscaya allah‌ sabakichura upara ksamatabana
He manusa [1]! Tomara tomadera se'i rabera [2] ‘ibadata karo yini tomaderake ebam tomadera purbabartiderake srsti karechena [3], yate tomara taka'oya adhikari ha'o

Yini yaminake tomadera jan'ya bichana o asamanake karechena chada ebam akasa hate pani abatirna kare ta dbara tomadera jibikara jan'ya phalamula utpadana karechena. Kaje'i tomara jene-sune ka'uke allah‌ra samakaksa [1] damra kari'o na

Ara amara amadera bandara prati ya nayila karechi tate tomadera kono sandeha thakale tomara era anurupa kono sura anayana kara [1] ebam allah‌ byatita tomadera sakala saksi-sahayyakarike [2] ahbana kara, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o

Ata'eba, yadi tomara ta karate na paro ara kakhana'i ta karate parabe na [1], tahale tomara se aguna theke bamcara byabastha karo, yara indhana habe manusa o pathara [2], ya prastuta kare rakha hayeche [3] kapheradera jan'ya

Ara yara imana eneche ebam sat kaja kareche taderake subha sambada dina ye, tadera jan'ya rayeche jannata, yara taladese nadi prabahita [1]. Yakhana'i taderake phalamula khete deya habe takhana'i tara balabe, ‘amaderake purbe jibika hisebe ya deya hata eto ta'i’. Ara taderake ta deya habe sadrsyapurna kare'i [2] ebam sekhane tadera jan'ya rayeche pabitra saiini [3]. Ara tara sekhane sthayi habe
